name: OpenTok AdServerKit
description: An OpenTok Kit for integration with an adserver and creating a customer service application

OPENTOK_KEY.description: OpenTok API Key: Login to the TokBox Dashboard (https://dashboard.tokbox.com/keys) to get this value

OPENTOK_SECRET.description: OpenTok API Secret: Login to the TokBox Dashboard (https://dashboard.tokbox.com/keys) to get this value
